name: Fukaboshi
text:
If this Character would be K.O.d, you may rest your [Shirahoshi] Leader or your [Fish-Man Island] instead.
On Play: You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand; K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost or 1 or less.

effect.text: You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand; K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost or 1 or less.
